Bash(python3 -c "
import zipfile
import os

fap_path = ''build/f7-firmware-D/.extapps/tonuino_writer.fap''
if os.path.exists\(fap_path\):
    try:
        with zipfile.ZipFile\(fap_path, ''r''\) as zip_ref:
            print\(''FAP contents:''\)
            zip_ref.printdir\(\)
    except:
        print\(''FAP is not a ZIP file, checking as ELF...''\)
        print\(f''File size: {os.path.getsize\(fap_path\)} bytes''\)
")
